name: The Dark Knight Rises
storyline: Play as Batman or Catwoman through 8 thrilling levels, from Gotham Streets to City Hall and the Stock Exchange. Unlock Batman's gadgets and vehicles like the Batarang and the Bat-Pod to fight against Bane and his mercenaries, and enjoy deep immersion in the Batman universe thanks to rich gameplay that allows you to explore, fight and sneak your way through the game.
summary: Game based on the movie of the same name for iOS and Android.
